display_name: Short UPPS-P Impulsive Behavior Scale: Positive Urgency Subscore
description:
Summary item from the Short UPPS-P Impulsive Behavior Scale, calculated from :upps_3:, :upps_10:, :upps_17: and :upps_20:. [Cyders et al 2014 (PMID: 24636739)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4055534/)

[Search for all Short UPPS-P Impulsive Behavior Scale variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/answers/variables?search=upps)
